name: kost boy lifehack (indonesian version)
description:
Kost Boy Lifehack

is indonesian college student game based on lifehack whih uses flash as the engine, you have to choose what items that can be used to do your daily life when the real tool is trashed,

this is indonesian version of this game the english version is still work in progress

so enjoy and let me know if there was any error or bugs, sorry for the grammar and thank you
